title: CVIII lectures vpon the fourth of Iohn Preached at Ashby-Delazouch in Leicester-shire. By that late faithfull and worthy minister of Iesus Christ. Arthur Hildersam.
author: Hildersam, Arthur, 1563-1632.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by George Miller, for Edward Brewster, and are to be sold in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bible,
